data.title: Best University in Caloocan [2024 Rankings]
data.meta_description: The best university in Caloocan is Manila Central University (ranked 10394th globally). Check 10 more universities near Caloocan ranked based on their reputation, research performance, and alumni impact.
data.meta_site_name: EduRank.org - Discover university rankings by location
data.text:
EduRank.org is an independent metric-based ranking of 14,131 universities from 183 countries. We utilize the world's largest scholarly papers database with 98,302,198 scientific publications and 2,149,512,106 citations to rank universities across 246 research topics. In the overall rankings we add non-academic prominence and alumni popularity indicators. Always check official university websites for the latest enrollment information.

Ranking methodology
